title: Urgent Help Needed: Donations for Hospitalized Cat at Crown Vet Hospital, Kalyani Nagar, Pune (Posting all the proofs and hospital bills) QR is also there
selftext:
Hello, fellow Redditors!

I hope this post finds you well. Today, I am reaching out to this amazing community for urgent help and support. A dear feline friend is currently in critical condition and is receiving treatment at Crown Vet Hospital in Kalyani Nagar, Pune. We are a group of college students who found this poor kitty in dire need, and we cannot afford to cover the entire hospital bill on our own. We are kindly requesting your assistance in the form of donations, no matter how small.

Cat is in critical condition and is admitted , she is eating food so that's a good sign . The hospital bill has reached  around 18k

The veterinary team at Crown Vet Hospital has been exceptional in their care, providing round-the-clock attention and treatment. However, the expenses have started to accumulate, and it's becoming increasingly challenging for us to manage everything alone.

We understand that times are tough for everyone, but even a small contribution can make a significant difference in saving this precious life. Every penny donated will go directly towards covering the cat's medical bills, including surgeries, medications, and other necessary procedures.

Here's how you can help:

Donation Options: We have set up a donation fund through a reliable platform [UPI] to facilitate easy and secure transactions. [Siddharth -8421799102]

Share and Spread the Word: If you're unable to contribute financially, that's absolutely okay. We would be immensely grateful if you could share this post with your friends, family, and other communities. The more people who see this, the higher the chances of reaching our goal.

Moral Support: Your words of encouragement, prayers, and positive vibes are also valuable to us during this challenging time. Feel free to leave comments and messages of support.

We will make sure to keep everyone updated on the cat's progress and the utilization of funds. Transparency is of utmost importance to us, and we will provide all necessary documentation upon request.

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for taking the time to read this post and for considering helping us. Together, we can make a difference and give this cat a fighting chance at a happy and healthy life.

TL;DR: A cat is hospitalized at Crown Vet Hospital in Kalyani Nagar, Pune. We are college students unable to afford the entire medical bill. We kindly request your donations, no matter how small, to help save this cat's life. Please share this post if you're unable to contribute financially. Your support means the world to us!
comments: The bill has reached around 18k the Screenshot asking 5000 is 2 days old ( I have attached the bills too) we are college students so 18k is a big amount for us
Sent some money , god bless you guys.
Couldn't do a lot but did what I could
Transferred some money, pls donate guys üôè
Hey update on the amount of money you got.

Hope he gets okay, ‚ù§Ô∏è
Transferred some money .

Pretty sure you wrote this using chatgpt but ok. 

I wish i had done this for my cat maybe she might have been still alive. FUCK it hurts thinking about how much she suffered before finally bring able to rest in peace.
Reach, hope the cato recovers soon ‚ú®
Sent a very menial ammount, but I hope Alex gets well soon
How much amount have you collected until now?

https://preview.redd.it/4ie0byazfj2b1.png?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=66707354265e61d5db79bab3e3866a8ec14a1d3a

Did my part jitna bhi I could.. hopefully billu Bhai will recover soon .. please share updates ‚ù§Ô∏è
This street dog menac is getting out of hand
UPDATE: Alex is better now , his vitals are okay , swelling is still there. He is eating food properly , he would be discharged by today evening and then he would be kept in foster for 10 days .

You should also make it easier for NRIs to donate. Many NRIs don't have UPI. Maybe ask the vet to accept international CC?

Also, try posing on gofundme (although not sure how it will work with International money transfer).
You are welcome, send me pictures when your friend is all better

Upvoted for visibility

Please cross post this on /r/pune
Hey did you reach your donation goal?
Did this guy give any update on the Cat? I had donated and asked for updates and this guy hasn't given any update yet.
Did this guy give any update on the cat ? I have donated and have been asking for updates but he hasn't updated about the cat's health yet.
Yes We don't need donations anymore
Thankyou everyone for donating and helping us,‚ù§Ô∏è We don't need donations anymore
Bro I updated in comments , he is currently at Foster for 10 days, if you want videos I can send

UPDATE- Alex is Fine now , he still has Swelling, his wounds are healing slowly , he's eating food properly. thankyou everyone for donating ‚ù§Ô∏è. WE DON'T NEED DONATIONS ANYMORE

https://preview.redd.it/99h24k8gp03b1.png?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=9b6502d36dca6e532af511bcffe09c594b7d0431
Yes please. Kindly do the needful in my DM . I had specifically requested you to give some updates.
